page.title: 07Hair.
page.content: I have my hair washed Wednesday and Saturday. I love to liie down on the edge of the bath and my mum will get a tel and put it under me and put some Timotei on my hair and scrub it in. But before she does that she wets it. When she scrubs my hair it hurts so I shout. And then she rinses it off and does the same again. Then she puts conditioner on and then I am done. When I have my hair cut my mum cuts it and when she puts the scissors in my head it hurts and I keep on telling her when it is ready. She says " in five minutes" and when i look at my watch it's been twenty minutes.
